name: Building On The Edge
description:
You are on the edge of a cliff, crowded with buildings. You have the urge to build more. You MUST build more. The trucks keep coming. Where do they come from? Don't run out of Money or you're fired!

Click to pick up things. Arrow keys rotate things.

Building things cost money.

Covering green spots earns money and points.

Building higher costs more, with with greater rewards.

Watch out for garbage rooms! You won’t earn money or points from them.
